original_text: For the people of Joseph were two tribes, Manasseh and Ephraim. And no portion was given to the Levites in the land, but only cities to dwell in, with their pasturelands for their livestock and their substance.
korean_text: 이는 요셉의 자손이 므낫세와 에브라임의 두 지파가 되었음이라 이 땅에서 레위 사람에게 아무 분깃도 주지 아니하고 다만 거주할 성읍들과 가축과 재산을 위한 목초지만 주었으니

sentences.original_text: For the people of Joseph were two tribes
And no portion was given to the Levites in the land
sentences.korean_translation: 레위 지파에게는 땅에서 몫을 주지 않았고

sentences.original_text: but only cities to dwell in
with their pasturelands for their livestock
